rules_text:
Multikicker {2} [i](You may pay an additional {2} any number of times as you cast this spell.)[/i]
Choose one, then choose another for each time Arboreal Contortion was kicked –
• Target creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
• Target creature you don't control gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
• Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control.
